Title: Commission Fee Always Displays as 0.00 EUR in Confirmation Messages
Environment: App: Currency Converter (Android, v1.2.3); Device: Pixel_6a_API_34 emulator (Android 14.0); Date: March 22, 2025
Steps to Reproduce: 1. Open the app and go to the currency converter page. 2. Set 'Sell' currency to EUR and 'Receive' currency to USD using search. 3. Sell 500 EUR. 4. Submit the conversion. 5. Check the confirmation
